original_text: I tell you, even though he will not get up and give you the bread because of friendship, yet because of your shameless audacity he will surely get up and give you as much as you need.
korean_text: 내가 너희에게 말하노니 비록 벗 됨으로 인하여서는 일어나서 주지 아니할지라도 그 간청함을 인하여 일어나 그 요구대로 주리라

sentences.original_text: even though he will not get up and give you the bread
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 일어나서 너에게 빵을 주지 않을지라도

sentences.original_text: yet because of your shameless audacity
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너의 부끄러움 없는 대담함 때문에

sentences.original_text: and give you as much as you need
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 필요한 만큼 너에게 줄 것이다
